ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { goalBenefit : vars.policyInfo.goalBenefit as Number, goalAge: vars.policyInfo.goalAge as Number, ageNow: vars.policyInfo.age as Number, accountScore: vars.accountInfo.accountScore as Number }

java:invoke-static.doc:name: Invoke static

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.matrix map{ annualPremium : $.annualPremium, disabilityInsurance : $.disabilityInsurance, policyValue : $.policyValue, lifeInsurance : $.lifeInsurance, insuredAge : $.insuredAge, claimable : $.claimable as Number / 4, year : $.year, policyNumber : vars.policyNumber as Number }

db:bulk-insert.doc:name: Bulk insert
db:bulk-insert.db:sql: insert into policyretirementmatrix ( annualPremium, disabilityInsurance, policyValue, lifeInsurance, insuredAge, claimable, year, policyNumber) values ( :annualPremium, :disabilityInsurance, :policyValue, :lifeInsurance, :insuredAge, :claimable, :year, :policyNumber)

db:insert.db:sql: insert into policyretirement (username, benefit, retirementAge, beneficiaryName, beneficiaryIdNum, policyNumber, annualPremium) values (:username, :benefit, :retirementAge, :beneficiaryName, :beneficiaryIdNum, :policyNumber, :annualPremium)
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ username : vars.accountInfo.username, benefit : vars.policyInfo.goalBenefit, retirementAge: vars.policyInfo.goalAge, beneficiaryName: vars.policyInfo.beneficiaryName, beneficiaryIdNum: vars.policyInfo.beneficiaryIdNum, policyNumber: vars.policyNumber, annualPremium: vars.matrix[0].annualPremium}]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { goalBenefit : payload.goalBenefit as Number, goalAge: payload.goalAge as Number, ageNow: payload.ageNow as Number, accountScore: payload.accountScore as Number }

set-variable.value: #[(payload.goalAge as Number - payload.ageNow as Number) as Number]
#[(vars.inp.goalBenefit as Number / (vars.yearsToPay as Number))/ vars.inp.accountScore as Number]

db:select.db:sql: select * from bill where policyNumber = :policyNumber and isSettled = :isSettled
select * from policyretirementmatrix where policyNumber = :policyNumber and year = :year

db:update.db:sql: update policyretirement set isActive = :isActive, status = :status where policyNumber = :policyNumber

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- vars.accountInfo.insuranceWallet as Number + vars.matrix.claimable as Number]

db:update.doc:name: Copy_of_useraccount insuranceWallet
db:update.db:sql: update useraccount set insuranceWallet = :insuranceWallet where username = :username

set-payload.doc:name: Copy_of_Set Payload
